reviews.review:
WOW, en mi opinion este es el que mas me gusta de los 3 juegos de esta genial saga, mi favorita de hecho, bueno,  si disfrutas de una buena historia, para mi es buenisima, de un reto que no es extremadamente facil pero que tampoco llega a ser injusto en ningun momento, y ademas si te dejan espacio para experimentar con diferentes combinaciones de poderes geniales y armas, solo hay una palabra que decir, INSTABUY

mi juego favorito por muuucho.  magnifica historia, bien hecha y divertida jugabilidad, creo que me estoy alargando mucho pero bueno.

10 de 10

Très bon jeu. La direction artistique et le scénario sont géniaux ! Le gameplay est aussi très bon au clavier.

Entre 10 et 15 heures de jeu, ce qui est plutôt correct dans le genre.

Je recommande.
Игра мне очень понравилась. Очень инересный сюжет и неожиданная канцовка.

Bioshock Infinite is a definitive graphical improvement when compared to its predecessors, a game whose story its not passed in Rapture but rather in another city, a flying one by the name of Columbia.
The combat system is slighty improved, the gameplay keeps the basics but adds new elements for the player to interact and also new enemies and a brand new storyline which can be very confusing at times.

All in all, i had a great experience exploring every little spot of the map looking for all the recordings and listening to every bit of info that i could get my hands on. Booker and Elizabeth were interesting main characters with good enough villains to back them up. You might not understand the story in just one playthrough, especially if you just go for the quick game instead of taking some time to listen to every bit of the story told by the different characters.

The DLCs were okay in a way that it gave us more time with Booker and Elizabeth and their story and you will actually realize that Rapture and Columbia were more connected that we actually thought. Its a good buy if you have the money for it.

8,5/10. If you are a fan of the Bioshock series, you should get this game and dont listen to the negative reviews, play it for yourself and enjoy the experience.
Un consejo para disfrutarlo, en caso de que tengan una computadora no tan actual, pongan la calidad a 4:3

I'll be honest, I wish I could leave a neutral review for this. I loved Bioshock 1, and although I was disappointed with Bioshock 2, I was very excited for Infinite. For the first three fourths of the game, I was really disappointed. The story here, AMAZING, but I felt like the gameplay is stuck in 2008. I'm not going to say the gameplay improves in the later fourth of the game, (because it doesn't), but at that point I was accepting of the gameplay and wanted to progress because the story is that damn good. I find most people will agree with me on this. HOWEVER, do not buy this game without the DLC, the DLC is more of what I thought Infiite should've been, and it wraps up the story well. If you haven't played the fist Bioshock, I don't reccomend playing the DLC for Infinite until you do albeit. It will be a better more well rounded experience.

One of the few FPS games out there with an actual story. The developers actually took their time with this game. It had somewhat of a different feel to it than the other bioshocks (mainly the setting) and It just made the game. If your looking for a game that you'll have fun playing for hours and actually get a great story out of it then get this game even if it isn't on sale! It's worth it

"BioShock Infinite" é um jogo especial. Ele se propõe a fazer muitas coisas diferentes e realiza tudo com muita qualidade, sendo competente em várias camadas.

Quem encarar apenas como um jogo de tiro, vai encontrar um game mais refinado do que o "BioShock" original, com equilíbrio entre armas de fogo, poderes especiais e estratégia, graças aos trilhos pelos cenários e os elementos que Elizabeth pode conjurar. 
JOGO MUITO BOM

Bioshock Infinite é um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. Os personagens são MUITO mais marcantes que em qualquer outro jogo que já joguei, ele também possui gráficos MUITO bonitos E além de falar sobre paradoxo que é coisa que gosto muito <3.
Então, você está querendo comprar... compre as chances de se arrepender são poucas e AH também é recomendado jogar primeiro ~ou antes das DLCs~ os primeiros Bioshocks.

Es, simple y llanamente, una obra maestra. La jugabilidad y la sensación de disparo me han gustado mucho (aunque no tengo gran experiencia dentro de los shooter), y la historia es una maravilla bañada en originalidad.
Muy recomendado, es un título necesario en cualquier colección.

Hammer Spiel, fantastische Story, tolle Charaktere und geile Grafik. 
Einfach nur empfehlenswert.

I don't speak to inanimate objects very often but when this game ended I sat back and said...wow.  Some things I saw coming but not all of it.  The story in this game is amazing.  It twists and turns at all sorts of places and then ties it all together in a really amazing conclusion.
The graphics are really nice and the gameplay is just as good as any of the other Bioshock games, save one thing.  its even better!  I was slightly disapointed that you could only carry two guns at a time in this one but it compensates with the range of vigors you can use and easy to find ammo, which is a big plus compared to other Bioshock games.
This has to be one of the best games (if not the best) that I have ever played!
Only real down point is that with the rest of the Bioshock games, once you have completed it.  That is it...Not much reply value although this time they added a chapter by chapter sequence so you can replay parts of the story again.  Plus there is plentry to make your money worthwhile within the storyline.

The first Bioshock has me coming back to it on a yearly basis to this day. The second one not so much. Bioshock Infinite? Right up there with the first one. An awesome gameplay experience that feels both fresh and familiar at the same time (for fans of the previous games). If you enjoyed the story of the first Bioshock, consider getting the DLC as well. You won't regret it!

Красиво, уютно, атмосферно.
Жаль что так коротко.
Настоятельно рекомендую к прохожденю.
9 солей из 10
Fun game, nice, confusing story that ties itself up in the end.
Игра круть!!!

Really good game i finished it just now and the ending is sad but if you want to know more play the whole game

I RATE THIS GAME 10 out of 10
Insanely fun gameplay coupled with an intriuging and mindblowing story makes for what is likely my favorite game.
I wish I could press "yes" more than once, this game is one of the best I've played in a long, long time and strongly recommend buying if you've got your eye on it.
Good.

Absolutely beautiful. Amazing graphics and gameplay even at the lowest setting. The characters have excellent backstories and contributions to the story line. The only negatives i really have about this game is the constant attacks, (it would have been nice to enjoy the beauty and time put into the animation more) and THAT ENDING!! (The ending was worse than an Inception mind screw... I'm still thinking it over) Anyway, an amazing game and I highly reccomend it!
Gran juego uno de los mejores que he jugado.

Gostei bastante da jogabilidade, não é muito fácil de acostumar no começo, mas depois que acostuma não sobra um :)

Tem gráficos bem legais, e uma boa história!
Recomendo a qualquer um!

Ese juego esta super piolas, es un shooter realmente frenetico, no te aburre, y es una campaña que deja un muy buen sabor, en si la historia  es sobre la princesa en el castillo que tienes que rescatar.
El juego es violento, pero te dan ganas de volarle la cabeza a un soldado, una de las cosas que criticaria seria la IA, es buena, pero si te vas a otra area y no mataste a tus enemigos siguen ahi, ademas que hay cientos de vigors y los soldados no los usan, otra cosa que me encanto fue la manera en la que dan vida a elizabeth, realmente se siente humana, asi actua, ademas de que siempre te lanzara cosas utiles, pero hay veces que parece que le habla la pared, otra cosa es que es el bioshock mas facil, aqui tienes escudo!!!
Si tienes la oportunidad, COMPRALO!!!! no te defraudara, es lo que un amante de los FPS que quiere algo diferente lo encuentra aqui

De source assurée(la mienne), je m'accorde à dire que BIOSHOCK INFINITE ainsi que les autres bioshock sont des chefs-d'oeuvres...le scénario de cet épisode y est un peu compliqué mais très intéressant.Le gameplay est préférable avec manette.Le jeu est très beau et très intense.Les personnages sont tous plus charismatiques les uns que les autres.Les doublages sont de bonne qualitée surtout la voix de booker et d'elisabeth! Si vous hésitez à vous le proccurer et que vous aimés les F.P.S un peu fantaisique foncez vite prendre ce jeu.Pour finir les DLC vallent vraiment le coup avec 2 niveaux compléments très bon ainsi qu'un petit mode survie sympa...
Ce jeu est une vraie affaire!
Geiles Spiel, war so geil das ich kaum aufhören konnte zu zocken. Hab sogar mein Abi geschmissen weil es so gut war.
Obra maestra.Mi juego preferido de la saga bioshock , sobran las palabras.Por cierto haceros un favor y comprar los dlcs no se os ocurra verlos por youtube.
lo amé :3
Super End der serie DLC werven leider einige fragen auf die warscheinlich nimals gelöst werden.
"gameplay desgastante mas historia foda" by Eu 9/10

Игра просто щикарна.
С самого начала и вплоть до конца она поражает вас своей необычайной атмосферой и глубиной сюжета. Сюжет, который не каждый сможет раскрыть сразу. Даже увидев всю картину целиком, хочется проходить ее снова и снова.
Динамичные и достаточно сложные местами бои, плавно переходящие в очень трогательные моменты.
Очень качественно прорисованый, полный вымышленный мир.
Яркие и запоминающиеся персонажи.
В общем, игра в готи 10/10. Одна из таких, кторые должны быть на полке у каждого "думающего" игрока.

Отрицательный отзыв за лицемерные политические игры против обычного народа, а не тех, кто устраивает войны. 

Игры этой серии всегда были как минимум отличными, а эта так вообще лучшая часть серии.
Невероятный летающий город. Хотя и слишком невероятный на мой взгляд. Скорее нелепый местами. Да, он держится не на баллонах с гелием или ещё чем, а на частицах Лютэз (читай на волшебстве), но подводный город как-то логичней был. Хотя выглядит великолепно, ничего не скажешь. :) С Восторгом не сравнится, но всё равно отлично.
Элизабет великолепна! Особенно в самом начале. К кончу игры она существенно изменится. Неплохо с мимикой, но кажется ещё в далёком Half-life 2 у спутницы героя мимика была намого более реалистичная.
Вообще стиль игры несколько нелеп. Как будто нарочно. Механики эти дурацкие. Впрочем, это так, мелочи.
Играется отлично, хотя вся остальная игра по сравнению с сюжетом ничто.
Культовая фраза "будь любезен", от которой после первой части бросает в дрожь и старшая сестричка из второй (кстати, параллели с Лизкой на лицо) не идут ни в какое сравнение с тем, что творят Букер, Элизабет, Комсток и Лютэз. Это шедевр среди сюжетов, а что бы всё понять нужно приложить немало усилий по складыванию этой мозаики с параллельными мирами и временными линиями. А после концовки вообще сидишь перед экраном с открытым ртом и думаешь: что это было вообще!? А когда понимаешь, сидишь с открытым ртом дальше.
В дополнениях Морская Могила всё ещё более закручено. Невинная Элизабет-из-башни мстит так, что волосы на голове становятся дыбом. И концовку первого эпизода тоже нужно долго переваривать с открытым ртом перед монитором. :))
Второй эпизод ещё более шикарен и непонятен. Ну и по традиции, после концовки ещё долго пытаешься понять и связать всё воедино. Вроде и понимаешь, а вроде как и... В общем сюжет сложный, мощный и полон неожиданностей (подвязывайте челюсть!). Оценка: шедевр. Остальную часть игры можно оценить всего лишь в 10/10. ^_^
Muito foda!!!
What a beautiful twist to the bioshock series.
= Mind Blown

Personally the best in the Bioshock series. It's such a beautiful game, amazing scenery, clothes, weapons. The story is really interesting and the plot twist at the end is great. The ending is a little confusing. 10/10 recommend this.

Perfect 10/10

No words to describe the depth of our two protagonists. Huge twist that gradually unravels, a great thing. UGH SO GOOD.

6.5/10
Negative review because it didn't live up even close to the hype. Worst in the series regarding gameplay.

Pros
- Plotline is pretty good. 
- Bad guys are cops. (Feels like GTA)
- Upgrade Cost keeps you from becoming too overpowered
- Great graphics (Awesome Gore)
Cons
- Plot execution is awful. (Especially the end. It leaves you thinking, "that's it") 
- Gun fights are ridiculously boring and long. (Even the gore gets repetitive)
- Handymen (Big Daddy/Sister equivalent) are a pain and lack gratification
- "Booker, catch"
If you haven't played and want to know the story, I suggest you watch a lets play. Gameplay is tedious and repetitive
If you can find this game on sale again with the the DLC, get it. Burial at Sea is amazing. Burial at Sea's gameplay is actually really damn good, Episode 2 especially. Although playing through all of episode 2 stealth mode doesn't change the outcome of the game, but the personal challenge made it feel even better to play.

I can't describe how good the story is in this game. Maybe the gameplay it's not as fantastic (sometimes too easy), but this story totally worth every minute of it. 

Besides, you get to kill racists. And eat cake. From a trashcan.
One of my favorite games of all time! Couldn't recommend it any more!

Out of all in the Bioshock series this is my favorite I love the story and game play favorite part is where you kill cumshot.

Amazingly well done game, with a great and mind-bending storyline. The weapons are spectacular definitions of death in this work of art, each with its own strengths, weaknesses, and the ability to either inhibit or to aide your personal playstyle. With the addition of the Tear mechanic and rapidly unfolding plot, this game has truly set itself asside from the other more mainstream FPS games. This game, I highy recommend...
One of the best games ever. Fantastic story and very fun gameplay
Ну тут сказать можно коротко!Сюжет отлично!Всё остально ужас!Но я люблю сюжет в играх так что наверно плюс.

Honestly, this is probably the best game I have ever played. It can be very confusing, but if you keep an open mind, you will definitely enjoy it. I recommend it to anyone who loves good stories and good shooters.

Шедевр.
146 из 100.
Fun gameplay and amazing graphics.

Great gameplay with fantastic storyline. The plot was amazing and I enjoyed it from start to end. The character development was great and I have to say that Elizabeth is one of the most well made characters in any of the games I have played. Even though the weapon choices were limited it did not matter as the storyline was enough to keep me playing.

The ending was  emotional and it gave me goosebumps. 

This game is one of the best games I have ever played and I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

I  wish I can play this game like it was the first time again 10/10
lllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllll

Зышибись игра
good graphics,good gameplay and combats..and i fell in love with Elizabeth!!.highly recommend 10/10

До сих пор ржу с тех школьников, что наевшись рекламы ссались кипятком и бежали предзаказывать это изделие. Играется хорошо, сюжет оставим кинокритикам, главная изюминка Элизабет. А вот внешне игрушка выглядит  как средней поршивости. Свет просто ужасен(DX11 чуть лучше), текстуры замылены, а полное отсутствие физики меня удивило - все объекты в игре статичны. И всё это дело умудряет иногда просаживать мощное железо(вообще уже становится стандартом такая оптимизация и молодое поколение геймеров принимает это за норму).  К звуку претензий нету. Тем не менее игру рекомендую к ознакомлению, сам играл ради карточек :-) я старый и привередлевый геймер, меня таким не удивить

While it did take me this long to finally get around to playing this game, it was worth it.  And while the gameplay is touted as being repetitive, I would have to disagree. This game takes the typical FPS shooter mechanics and blends with with their unique aspects like using Vigors which are drinks that give you extraordinary powers, and using the sky hook to melee and fly around the map on rails. With as awesome as the gameplay is, the story and atmosphere is the main course. With one of the most intricate and unpredictable endings I have ever played, the story will amaze it and drag you in. Not too many games do that now-a-days. If you are at all interested in FPS games and/or story driven games, then this is something you MUST play.  10/10

This game was a great and amazing experience. Even though this is my first bioshock game, it has pulled me into the need to play the other bioshocks. The story is so indepth and intense with such a great influence with its science. In summary, 
PLAY THIS GAME NOW!
(Sorry if my english is weird or misspelling)

It's hard to describe a whole new world created in our reality by such an amazing team of developers such as Irrational games with help of many others (just look at the ending titles). And thus it's nearly impossible to see the whole concept behind this game.

To be honest when I heard about Bioshock infinte for the first I was like "yeah sure, haha" ironic. I hadn't even played the first one so lets just try and I gave it a chance. And what happened? Well I laughed to me and me alone for how foolish I was. I am not into "church" hings but the story just dragged me in. The graphics dragged me in. And for the most Elizabeth dragged me in and never let me go. I was eager to finish it but I didn't want to finish it because that would mean the end of it. And the moment when all the puzzle pieces started to settle together was absolutely worthless. The plot, the answers the questions... I just starred with my mouth opened. The same happened with the DLCs (Bural episode 1 + 2). I cannot tell you how its possible to have game plot so deep, so immense that you can discover more and more and everytime you think you understand...you just do not. 

Just thank you for such an experience that absolutely perseduaded me that computer games may become an art. Bioshock series and mainly Bioshock Infinite with it's DLC is a motf***ing piece of art. And I love it.

Ps: truly infinite

Alors sans parler des effets speciaux geniaux ; des armes ; de ce decors de MALADE !!!
Vous allez adorer ce jeu pour son scenario qui est pour juste digne d'un roman de Jules Vernes et ces personnages auquel on s'accroche et qui sont vivants .

One of the best games of 2013 (and recent years?)! I have finished it twice now (first on PS3). The review might come a little late but it's because I just finished the DLC now. Columbia is another amazing world to explore and let yourself immerse into. The story is mindblowing, especially at the ending. Gameplay wise it's a little too much of a shooter and it could use a bit more 'open world' or puzzles with for instance using the different vigors. 
If you loved the main game I would really advise you to play both episodes of the Burial at Sea dlc. It adds more depth gameplay wise and again the ending will blow your mind.
말할 필요도 없습니다. 명작 중의 명작

Отличная игра.
2019- прошёл опять этот шедевр

Une qualité graphique franchement énorme, un gameplay plutôt bien constitué, une histoire qui accroche.
Quelques points un peu plus négatifs: le scénario est franchement bien mais peut rebuter par sa complexité, le fait que l'on puisse moins explorer que dans les autres bioshock.
Cependant, le gameplay est riche de combinaisons, les armes que l'on peut transporter en nombre limité obligé à faire évoluer sa tactique.  La bande son est bien fichue et les voix étrangères sont belles également. La durée de vie est très correcte et le final laisse sur le cul. On y retrouve un vrai travail de recherche historique sur les années 1910.
Ce jeu a quelques petits défauts mais d'écrasantes qualités. On y retrouve toutes les qualités qui ont fait le succès de la saga. Il a très bien négocié la rupture avec l'environnement de Rapture.
Les DLC sont franchement riches et intéressants, et apportent des éléments nouveaux sur Rapture.
Le prix peut rebuter mais achetez le en réduction ou en season pass, il le vaut largement.

[quote][i] Наш разум с рождения объят порочными мыслями. Некоторые столь дики, что никогда не найдут прощения. Разум нужно вырвать с корнями. Моих детей не за что винить. Они безупречны и лишены выбора. Ибо в чем ценность воли, если дух порочен?…[/i][/quote]

[i] Шедевр? Да. Даже больше. Это сердце и душа, отношения и взаимодействие Букера и Элизабет. Элизабет воспринимается как боевой партнёр, компаньон, друг. Помогает играющему - находя патроны, здоровье, открывая разрывы.  Создает близкую связь между Вами и Элизабет. Игра потрясающая. Особенно не забываемое впечатления совмещения игрока и персонажа.  Настоящее произведение.

В игре BioShock Infinite идеально всё - музыка, интересный сюжет, сами персонажи, цитаты, оружие, парящий город Колумбия. Всё.

Кто не играл но начал, не спешите пробежать игру. Почувствуйте весь мир и боль персонажей.

Рекомендую: 10/10[/i]

I'm not a huge FPS fan, but even despite that I can look at this game and know that it's near-perfect.
The storyline and presentation are engrossing.
The action is fluid and fun.

The vigours make combat a lot of fun and Elizabeth's participation in the world around her makes everything that much more believable.
I find myself still thinking about the game a day after finishing it which is always a good sign.

It has a high replay value as well - I'm already wondering about what I could've done better and want to try replaying it soon.
The best FPS game I have ever played.
Good Game !!! 10/10

Вы думаете, что здесь главный герой - это вы?. Неееет, очень глубокое заблуждение. Элизабет - вот то яркое солнышко, что освещает Колумбию и согревает сердце нашего Букера Девитта.

완벽한 스토리, 흠잡을데없는 아름다움을 표현해내는 그래픽, 사랑스러운 엘리자베스, 불안정한 정신상태와 인간성을 인간성을 가진 주인공 부커, 몰입감이 높은 진행
이 게임에서 제일 부족한건 후속작이지 싶습니다. 나오기만 한다면 바로 예약구매 하고 싶을정돕니다.

게임성이 전작들에 비해서 좀 구데기 같은데요.
무기 2개만 들고 댕기는건 그냥 저한텐 사기총만 들고 다니란말이라 그건 좀 아쉽습니다.

개인적으론 게임보단 영화나 드라마로 나왔으면 완성도가 높았을겁니다.
게임은 전체적으로 재밌으므로 충분히 살 가치가 있습니다. 세일때 구매 추천드려요!

This game is by far the best game in my collection...
[u]GAMEPLAY[/u]
As far as gamplay is concerned...Bioshock infinite is a normal First Person Shooter...BUT....The vigors make the gameplay very interesting as you'll have to use different combinations of your abillities and weapons to take down your enemies...and the skylines give you the opportunity to take a better position in the battlefield ...(this is very helpfull if you are using a sniper)

[u]GRAPHICS[/u]
The graphics in this game are JUST beautifull....in order to capture its beauty you have to play the game on ultra...

[u]PLOT[/u]
This game has one of the most addictive plots i have ever seen...you wont want to stop playing...the characters are very detailed and you get to hate/love some of them....But be prepared...because when you finish the game you will suffer the BIGGEST mind fuck you've ever seen..

RATING:9.5/10 Its a must have for every serious  gamer....
Show stealer. Buy it now.

After a lot of thought I am cautiously recommending this game.

[b]TLDR: One of my favorite B-movies, but it hardly works as a video game.  Get it (on sale) if you like convoluted sci-fi backstory and beautiful world design.[/b] 


I can't say much about the game or gameplay that you can't find in other reviews.

I liked it enough to play through it and the DLC a couple times.  The stealth mechanics in Burial at Sea Part 2 are fun!  I would have played the entire main game like that, had I been given the choice. [spoiler]Even though apparently I never had one to begin with.  More irony...[/spoiler]

One of the best game experiences I have ever had the pleasure of playing. Ken Levine tells an amazing story set in a world that you can't help but be pulled in to. Gameplay interweaves both exposition and fun allowing you to tap into the power fantasy feeling of blasting enemies with lighting while also engaging you in the Bioshock universe.

Burial At Sea is one of the only times I would ever say that DLC is a required purchase. It's a justified full fledged expansion and conclusion to Infinite.
First AAA PC game I played.

Bioshock Infinite es un shooter en primera persona con una excelente historia, una ambientación antigua-futurista, un estilo de ritmo rápido, diversos desafíos, y de personajes dinámicos que ayudan a mantener el juego fresco.


[h1][b]Historia[/b][/h1] Sin duda el punto mas destacable de este juego, llena de cambios drásticos e inesperados.
Nos hallamos en el año 1912 en donde tomamos el papel de Booker DeWitt, un ex agente de la Agencia Nacional de Detectives Pinkerton donde fue despedido por mal comportamiento, El juego da comienzo con el protagonista en un bote, junto a una pareja remando y discutiendo sobre que alguien "no hará tal cosa" y al fondo un faro brillando en medio de la lluvia que nos llevara a una ciudad en los cielos, lo demás se los dejo a ustedes


[h1][b]Gráficos[/b][/h1] Simplemente fantásticos, el toque caricaturesco que tenían las otras entregas no la perdió, aunque el titulo no presente un elevado nivel gráfico topando el realismo, si presenta un elevado nivel artístico donde en este caso era lo que se necesitaba, escenarios amplios, llenos de riquezas y muchos detalles.

[h1][b]Jugabilidad[/b][/h1] Sigue con la linea general de la saga, es decir el perfecto estilo shooter con vigorizadores (Plásmidos) en una mano y armas en la otra, controles rapidos y faciles de dominar, con algunos tiroteos poco inspirados e innecesarios. Durabilidad corta de aproximadamente 8 a 10 horas.

[h1][b]Audio y Banda Sonora[/b][/h1] Buen nivel tanto como en sus entregas anteriores, sonidos de las armas, enemigos, explosiones, dialogos, todo es entremezclado para lograr un envolvimiento perfecto y completo en Columbia, la banda sonora del juego es simplemente asombrosa, empezamos con  música relajante y tranquila para para luego pasar a los momentos de acción mas intensos en los que la banda sonora sale a relucir. 

[h1][u][b]Positivos[/b][/u][/h1] 

-Historia pefecta y bien escrita
-Arte conceptual fenomenal
-Personajes memorables 
-Graficos que encajan perfecto con el apartado artistico
-Dificultad alta
-Gran cantidad de armas 
-Buen Doblaje al español 

[h1][u][b]Negativos[/b][/u][/h1] 

-Pocos tipos de vigorizadores
-Escasa variedad de enemigos
-Poca duración, me tomo unas 8 horas terminarlo por primera vez

[b]Puntuación Personal:[/b] 10/10 ★★★★★
amazing game.

Recomendo fortemente. A ambientação, a jogablidade e o enredo desse jogo são muito bons, e diferentemente dos jogos anteriores, os espaços agora são mais abertos, o que melhorou os combates. O único fator negativo é o fato de não ser possível explorar muito o mundo por ser um jogo linear. Além disso, só poder carregar duas armas por vez pode ser meio frustrante algumas vezes, mas acaba aumentando o desafio. Enfim, vale totalmente a pena pegar numa promoção.

Without a doubt the best game series I've ever played, EVER! Although the best for me was the original BioShock, BioShock Infinite came in a close second with BioShock 2 being last but was still awesome! Call me a fanboy? Sure, Im such a fan of them doing everything right (lol except for BioShock 2). I have all bioshocks on Xbox 360 and i have BioShock and Bioshock Infinite on Steam! The worst thing about this game is I think its the end! I fear everyone forgetting this masterpiece! BUY THIS AND BIOSHOCK ORIGINAL FOR AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE!!!

WOW great story, great visuals, and mechanics.

I have played the other bioshocks and this one has a hugh difference in feel, but it is a great thing. it has a great visual style with a steampunk feel. I always feel satisfied when i defeat a wave of enemies, and pilliage the bodies, I always get excited when I find a new power.
Ну просто великолепная хренатень) И сюжет и графика и спец эфекты и всё всё всё ! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dL113A75Hu0
Looking forward to more DLC!

One of the greatest games I have ever played. Fantastic story, brilliant characterization (especially from your in-game companion Elizabeth) and exhilarating combat. Runs beautifully graphic-wise on an aging laptop.

10/10 would recommend.

Just played the game. One little review told me, yet I had to see myself, that after the ending your brains and heart hurt. One of the best stories I've ever played. 10/10

Il est difficile de faire beaucoup de reproches à Bioshock Infinite, le jeu est beau, la prise en main est agréable et l'action bien dosée, le personnage d'Elisabeth est attachant, ça pète, c'est clairement une réussite.
Sauf sur un point auquel je vais consacrer quelques lignes (dans lesquelles il me sera difficile de ne pas spoiler un minimum, à bon entendeur/se...).
Tout en recommandant le jeu je suis très critique vis à vis du scénario que je trouve pauvre, voire carrément mauvais. Je m'explique : dans le jeu on a deux trames qui constituent la progression de l'histoire, la principale qui consiste en la découverte et l'évolution dans le monde social et politique de Columbia, et la seconde qui est la répétition d'une boucle temporelle par notre personnage et donc nous, ce qui donne quelques parallèles amusants (constantes temporelles). Mais là où le bât blesse, c'est qu'en fin de compte cette histoire de boucle temporelle qui commence par des anecdotes finit par constituer l'unique centre d'attention sans être d'un quelconque apport à l'univers du jeu, pire, elle désamorce complètement les enjeux scénaristiques préalablement établis. Pour être plus clair et plus franc, l'utilisation de cette histoire de voyage temporel superficiellement complexe cache la pauvreté de l'univers de Columbia qui ne devient qu'une jolie ville où les dominants sont des salauds en bleu et les dominés des salauds en rouge, et où même vos propres choix n'ont aucun sens ni aucune conséquence puisque vous ne faîtes finalement que tourner en rond dans le temps. Le procédé est malheureux s'il est accidentel et très discutable s'il est volontaire.
Sur ce point, Bioshock Infinite rompt avec ses prédécesseurs en ce que la beauté graphique semble avoir remplacé la profondeur scénaristique de l'univers ainsi que la liberté décisionnelle du joueur, et c'est bien dommage.
Je précise que ça reste une très bon jeu sur quasiment tous les points ^_^
